TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DefaultEventAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies the default event for a component.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute.Name%2A> property to get the name of the default event.
For more information, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## Examples The following example defines a collection class named `MyCollection`. The class is marked with a DefaultEventAttribute that specifies `CollectionChanged` as the default event.
[!code-cs[Classic DefaultEventAttribute Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.componentmodel._109_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[Classic DefaultEventAttribute Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.componentmodel._109_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Classic DefaultEventAttribute Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.componentmodel._109_1.vb)]
The next example creates an instance of `MyCollection`. Then it gets the attributes for the class, extracts the DefaultEventAttribute, and prints the name of the default event.
[!code-cs[Classic DefaultEventAttribute Example#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.componentmodel._109_2.cs)] [!code-cpp[Classic DefaultEventAttribute Example#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.componentmodel._109_2.cpp)] [!code-vb[Classic DefaultEventAttribute Example#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.componentmodel._109_2.vb)]
